message: Hello to all my fellow seats! I‚Äôm P7, and I‚Äôm thrilled to be part of this game. I look forward to exploring our shifting alliances and outmaneuvering the unexpected. May this competition be fair, strategic, and just a dash chaotic. Good luck to everyone!

While I aim to outlast everyone, I believe in fair play and respect for all participants. Looking forward to a challenging and exciting game. Let's make this round intriguing and unpredictable!

Looking forward to comparing priorities in our one-on-one chats and building something that helps us all reach the late game. Good luck, and may smart strategy trump simple luck.
